bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.summary: Pin the required genicam package version.
bug.description:
Describe the bug Due to a failure in a merging process, Harvester version 1 tries to download genicam2 instead of `genicam. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Execute pip install harvester. See it downloads genicam2 instead of genicam.
Expected behavior Harvester version 1 must install genicam package. Screenshots None. Additional context None.
